original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A six-year-old child has died in a road accident in Valaichchenai.
Sri Lanka Police said the accident was reported when a water bowser crashed on to a motorcycle, while reversing.
Area residents who arrived at the scene had assaulted the driver and his assistant and set fire to the water bowser, belonging to a construction company in the area.
They had also damaged several vehicles of the construction company.
Sri Lanka Police said the driver of the bowser and his assistant have been arrested.
